K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265a-16: de la gus pa brgyad kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265a-20: nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265a-22: sangs rgyas la gus pa'i 'du shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265a-23: ngo tsha shes pa'i 'du shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-0: khrel yod pa'i 'du shes @265b dang; rnyog pa med par bya'o snyam pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-1: dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i gus pa brgyad po de dag gis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-3: gang dag lhod cing yang dag par mi sdom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-4: dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba rnams mi gus pa 'di dag mi bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-6: dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-8: nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba der dge sbyong gi gzugs su gyur bzhin du; gos 'bar ba dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-12: mal cha 'bar ba dag gnod par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-13: de dag gi longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-14: yongs su spyad pa gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'bar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-16: kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba de mer gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-17: dge sbyong kha dog dang gzugs kyis gnod pa de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-19: 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-20: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa de dag gi 'gro ba yongs su ma dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:265b-22: dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-0: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas @266a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-1: 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-2: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa bdag gir byed na de mi dge ba'i las des brnyas pa brgyad 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-4: bems po lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-5: go dka' zhing le lo can du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-6: skye bo mang pos brgal ba'i bud med du 'gyur ba dang; rang dbang med cing bran du 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-7: mdog ngan cing mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-8: mdog ngan cing dbang chung grags par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-9: de la su yang bsu bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-10: sbyin gnas rnams la mgu bar mi byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-11: brnyas pa brgyad po 'di dag 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-13: de lta bas na bzang po ma yin pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dge sbyong sdig pa can gyis gzhan gyis phyag byas pa bdag gir mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-15: dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-16: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba ni tha na sa chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal ba tsam 'dor ba de yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-21: 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266a-22: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-0: sbyin gnas rnams @266b la kun du spyad pa'i don du phul ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-2: de la mi blun po de ni gom pa 'jog pa dang 'dor ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du gom pa 'dor zhing 'jog pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-19: thams cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bar spyod pa yin pa lta ci smos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-22: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-24: dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-25: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas ni dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang yongs su dag par bya mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-28: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni ngas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-30: sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:266b-32: bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa gang dag de la yon 'bul ba de dag tshad med pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-0: mi blun po tshul khrims 'chal pas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyar @267a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-1: gshags pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na yang sbyin pa po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-2: sbyin pa dag de'i yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam ji snyed la spyad pa de snyed kyi las kyi rgya mtsho chen po gsog par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-4: de lta bas na tshul khrims yongs su dag pas dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-5: zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-6: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong nyis brgyas bstan pa 'di thos nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag cing tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni gum yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-7: 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du dad pas stsal pa'i bsod snyoms gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi bgyi'o zhes smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-14: 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis gsung rab 'di mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-16: ngas dge slong gnyis la dad pas byin pa gnang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-21: gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267a-22: gang yang sems rnam par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-0: de la dge @267b slong ldan pa rnal 'byor spyod pa nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa gang zhig sbyin pa po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-1: sbyin bdag las chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-5: yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas 'khor pa'i skyon mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-6: 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag par mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-7: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-8: chos thams cad la bdag med par mos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rtogs pas ni ri rab tsam gyi kham dag gi dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-10: de'i yon shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-12: sbyin bdag gang dag las dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa de las de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'byor pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-16: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-17: gang byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-19: dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po sbyin bdag gi chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:267b-22: yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas sems rnam par grol ba tshad med pa la snyoms par 'jug na sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de'i rnam par smin pa yang tshad med par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na @268a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-1: yod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams ni yongs su zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-2: de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ni yongs su zad par gang yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-3: 'od srung; gang zhig sbyin pa po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-4: sbyin bdag gi dad pas byin pas yongs su spyad nas 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis log par ltung ba byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-5: mi gti mug pa de gnod pa ji tsam gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-7: de bas na dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-9: dge sbyong gi mi drang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-12: dge sbyong gi gya gyu rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni dge sbyong bsam pa dag pas yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-14: dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-15: gang mi gnas mi zag cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-20: yid nas kyang ma zag pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-21: de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-22: skye mched drug rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-23: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-24: rjes su dran pa drug dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-25: dam pa rnams la gus par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-26: pha rol tu 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-27: de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-28: dge sbyong gi le'u ste dang po'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268a-30: dge slong dge slong zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-0: bdag tu 'du shes @268b pa bcom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-1: sems can du 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-4: gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-6: bud med du 'du shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-8: bu mor 'du shes pa bcom pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-9: de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-15: srid pa'i chu bo las brgal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-16: 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-17: 'jigs pa thams cad las bral ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-18: 'jigs pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-19: de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-21: gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la bdag ni dge slong dge slong ngo snyam du khas 'che na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-22: bsam pas mos pa ma gtogs par nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-23: de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-25: sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-27: ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-28: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:268b-29: gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis nga'i bstan pa nub bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-0: @269a *// ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ba'i sha la gcan gzan nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-1: bya gang gis kyang za bar mi nus kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-2: seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung ba de dag ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-4: de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las mi blun po brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-7: brdzun du smra ba gang dag 'byung ba de dag nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-9: chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa can gyi dge slong du rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-14: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-20: bya khva ta lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-28: chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-35: mi gtsigs par smra ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-36: bzhi po de dag go; gzhan yang bzhi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-38: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-39: byas pa la smod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-40: sngon byas pa mi dran dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269a-41: mdza' bo la 'khu ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-2: dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-3: tshul khrims mi srung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-4: so sor thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-10: sems can du smra ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-12: gang zag tu smra ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-16: sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-17: chos la mi gus pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-18: dge 'dun la mi gus pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-19: bslab pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-23: dge 'dun mthun pa la mi dga' ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-24: gtsug lag khang la dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-25: 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-26: 'jig rten rgyang pan ba'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-33: chos la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-39: rmugs pa dang gnyid mang pa yin; 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la mi gnas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-43: lus rul cing brgyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:269b-44: nyon mongs pas snad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-1: ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-2: 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-6: 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-7: zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-8: gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-9: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdungs pas yongs su gdung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-13: lam ngan pa la gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-14: ser sna can du gyur te kun mi 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-15: thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod cing chog mi shes pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-16: ngoms mi myong zhing thos pa'i nan tan dang bral ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-20: mun par gzhol bas mun par gyur pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-21: rmongs pa la gzhol bas rmongs par gyur pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-22: log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-23: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270a-24: bzhi po de dag go ;gzhan yang bzhi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-0: spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos pa yin @270b te; bzhi po dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-1: de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni dal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-2: mgo smad par tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-3: gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing tshul 'chos pa yin; gos tshags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-4: dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-5: gong bur 'du shes pa mi sel bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-6: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-7: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung dang shing drung du gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-8: chos bdud rtsi'i sman mi tshol bar bkus te bor ba'i sman tshol ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-9: 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-10: de la ngag gi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-11: che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo shes shing che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo mgron du bos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-12: kho bos gang 'dod pa rnyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-13: bsti stang du byas nas rnyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-17: kho bo tshul khrims ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-18: kho bo ni bod par 'os pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-19: kho bo ni slar lan gdab pa'i 'os yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:270b-20: kho bo ni nus pa dang ldan zhing skal ba yod la mthu yod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-0: kho bo ni don rnam par nges pa @271a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-1: bstan pa la mkhas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-2: gang che ge mo zhes bya ba kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-3: kho bos de la 'di skad smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par byas; kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-4: kho bos legs so zhes bya ba thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-5: kho bos de la bgo ba thob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-6: yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mgron du gnyer ces bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-8: nges par mi sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa las tshig 'chal ba de lta bu gang ci byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-9: mi rigs pa rnams kyi yin gyi rigs pa rnams kyi ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-10: 'di ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-12: de la sems kyi tshul 'chos pa gang yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-13: gang sems kyis chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-14: bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung bar yongs su rtog la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-15: tshig gis bdag la ci yang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-16: gang sems kyis rnyed par 'dod la 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyis tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-17: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-18: sems kyis rnyed kyang ci ma rung snyam sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-19: tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgos med smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-20: med pa'i ngo bo'i yid kyis de smras te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-21: nam yang bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-22: sems kyis tshul 'chos bsam pas lha rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-23: klu dang lha mig can rnams slu bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271a-24: smras pa'i sems kyis nam yang dag mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-0: @271b de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis de mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-2: de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa sdig pa can rnams kyi cho ga ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu gang yin pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-5: dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-7: de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-12: rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-13: shi ba la re ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-14: byams pa med pa'i mig gis 'gro ba la lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-15: shi ba la dga' ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-17: de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-18: slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-19: de nas rnyed pa dang bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing khyim pa de dag chos sam 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-20: de rnyed pa'i ched du 'dris par byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-21: don gyi ched du ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-22: mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-24: 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-28: gdol pa ni tshong dpon dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:271b-31: khams kyi rgyal po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-0: yul gyi mi rnams kyis rtag tu yongs su @272a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-1: spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-2: gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-4: de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang; dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-7: dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-8: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su spong bar bya ba'i 'os yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-9: dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod cing tshul khrims 'chal par rig nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-10: thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-16: yongs su spyad pa de dag thams cad la ni skye bo ya rabs rnams mi reg cing yongs su mi spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-18: de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-20: yongs su spyad pa thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongs su btsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-22: sems smras pas yongs su btsal ba yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-24: yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-28: gdol pa ni kha phyis thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-29: zhum zhum por byas nas gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272a-31: de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang zhum zhum por byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten @272b la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-1: zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-2: zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-5: zhum zhum por byas nas 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-9: de ltar na zhum zhum por byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-11: de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rung ba ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-15: gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-17: 'di ltar de rang gi las kyi nyes pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-19: de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol ba lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-20: de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhig la; de ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par sgrib pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-22: 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-24: de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-28: rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog dang ldan pa las gang snying gu'i mchog bcus pa de'i lhag ma ni rul cing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-29: myang bar bya ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-31: de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang chos kyi mchog gi snying gu'i ro bro ba dang bral ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:272b-33: yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-2: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-3: nyon mongs pa'i dris bsgos pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-4: de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du yang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-5: gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-7: 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-10: rul pa zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-12: 'chos pa gzags pa de ni rul cing dri nga ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-13: skye bo ya rabs thams cad kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-15: de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang gzags pa dang mtshungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-16: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su ma dag pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-17: 'phags pa'i skye bos yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-18: 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-22: sa bon rul pa gang yin pa de ni sa chen po las skyer mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-24: de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-25: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mi skye zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-26: 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon nus pa ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-29: 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273a-31: de la dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-2: za ma tog phyi rol shin tu byi dor byas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-3: nad mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu yang dge sbyong ltar bcos shing phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-6: gti mug gis yongs su gang ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-8: 'di ni dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-10: de la dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-14: ku ran da ka zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha dog blta na sdug la reg na rtsub pa lci ba'i sbrang ma'i dri mnam zhing shi la bar ka'i rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-15: mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la mi reg /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-18: gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi shes pa de dag ni me tog de lta bu len cing snom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-20: de bzhin du dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu yang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-21: gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang mi nges pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-23: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-26: lta ba nyams pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-27: mdzangs pa mkhas pa rnams ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:273b-30: de'i tshul rig pas thag ring po pas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-1: rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten cing snyen la bsnyen bkur byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-2: ku ran da ka'i me tog byis pa'i lag na 'dug pa bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-3: de dang mthun pa nyid du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-5: 'di ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-7: de la chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-11: mi g-yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brkam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-12: chags pa'i zil gyis non pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-13: bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-14: gzhan gyi nor la re ba drag shul can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-20: rtag tu gdug cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-27: de 'di snyam du gzhan dag gi nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de bdag gir gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-28: re stes snyam du sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-29: de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyun bu mkhyun bur rgyu ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-31: de bzhin du chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag tu brkam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-32: chags pa'i zil gyis non pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-33: bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274a-34: gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-3: chos kyi phyir ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-4: spyod lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-6: bdag dge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-8: so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las bskrad par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-9: snyam nas rtag tu skrag cing rtag tu 'jigs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-10: spyod lam thams cad kyang g-yos spyod pas lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-13: dri za dag gis chom rkun 'ong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-23: chom rkun 'thung ngo; ;chom rkun skra 'dreg go zhes rig par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-28: dri za rnams kyis de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de thams cad rung ba ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-29: yongs su brtags pa ma yin par rig par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-30: rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-31: kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta bu dag gis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:274b-32: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-4: dri za rnams kyang 'di dag ni bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-6: chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni skyo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-8: 'bras bu 'thob pa lta ci smos kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-11: 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-13: de la dge sbyong shin te ma gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-17: 'bru'i nang na gang dag ma smin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-19: 'ongs med cing 'bru 'dra ba de dag ni shin te ma zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-21: de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-22: yang zhing mthu chung la bdud kyis zin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-24: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'phrogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-25: rlung gi g-yengs pa lta bu ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-27: dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-29: sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dvags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-30: de dag ni ngas dge sbyong shin te ma zhes btags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-32: de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang zhe na; 'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-35: nas kyi ljang bu phun sum tshogs pa'i nang na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275a-36: nas la gnod pa zhig skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-0: de ljang bu'i kha dog 'dra zhing rtags dang @275b dbyibs kyang 'dra bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-1: de la nas kyi bdag po de dag 'di snyam du 'di dag thams cad ni nas yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed skyed pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-2: gang gi tshe nas kyi ljang bu las snye ma byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-3: nas la gnod pa de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-5: de bzhin du dge sbyong sun par byed pa'i dge slong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-6: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-8: sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-9: kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-10: de la sbyin pa po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-11: sbyin bdag de dag dge slong ngo snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-12: sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-15: dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-16: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-17: nang rul cing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-18: shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-19: sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-23: dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-24: de sems can dmyal bar skye bar mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-25: mthong nas kyang mi gti mug pa 'di ni sngon dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:275b-26: gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas de sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:276a-0: nas la gnod pa la nas @276a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:276a-1: kyi yon tan med pa ltar 'di la yang dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi 'bras bu med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:276a-2: zhes snying rje chen po skyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:276a-4: 'di ni dge sbyong sun par byed ba zhes bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277a-20: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277a-24: btang snyoms kyi gzi med pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277a-26: nges pa'i gzi med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277a-27: dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277a-33: sems yongs su dag pa'i gzi med pa 'di ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-2: gzi 'phrogs pa de lta bu rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-5: zhe sdang la byams pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-10: gsum bsdam pa'i phyir lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-12: sems yongs su dag pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-19: skye mched shes pa dang; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-22: smon pa med pa shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-23: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta bu 'di dag gis kyang de la mi tshugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-24: de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:277b-25: de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-0: dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lnga @278a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-1: brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa spyad par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-2: mi rung zhes nyams par byas te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-12: khyim na gnas pa 'di ni dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin te; dge slong dad pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-15: bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278a-21: dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-0: bam po gnyis @278b pa ste tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-3: dge slong ci lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-8: dge slong yongs su dag pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-11: gang yang zag pa zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-12: dgra bcom par gyur pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-14: dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-20: kha cig ni dgon pa pa zhi ba'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-21: kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-22: kha cig ni grong 'dab na gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-23: kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-25: kha cig ni chos smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:278b-27: kha cig ni ma mo 'dzin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-0: pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste; sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod @279a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-5: 'od srung; de la dge slong dgon pa pa bas mtha'i mal stan pa gang yin pa de dag ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-8: dus ma yin par gsol ba mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-9: dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-11: gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las res bab na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-13: yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las de byed du gzhug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-14: dge slong dgon pa pa la gnod par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279a-16: de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-1: mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-5: bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-8: de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas lung nos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-9: lhogs shig; kha ton gyis shig /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-15: de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:279b-16: las su bsko bar mi bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-009:280b-18: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o; ;dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o //
